issue.title: [C++] Support `SetNull` in NumericalBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15829](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15829). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In `NumericalBuilder`, we are able to set/update a value but unable to set value as null. It seems straightforward to add such functionality. I could help with that.
